title: Personal Website
description: Personal website using React,SCSS to create interactive webpage. Deployed in AWS.

title: Travel Expenses Web App
description: Web application using C# doing CRUD operation and Angular Framework creating single-page application (SPA) from imported dataset via file-IO.

title: Tab Finder Extension
description: Chrome browser extension that gives user to search thier currently opened tab and allows them to quickly switch to chosen tab.

title: Task Scheduler
description: C# console app that allows user to perform CRUD operation managing their tasks and save it to the database.

title: Peer Tutor Web Application
description: Java web application via Servlet that allows user to input to search data from the database and output the result according to the condition.

title: Rental Board
description: Website create by PHP that allows user to perform CRUD operation about their rental unit.
